00051 /* QEI Reset types */
00052 #define QEI_RESET_POS                   QEI_CON_RESP            
00053 #define QEI_RESET_POSOnIDX              QEI_CON_RESPI           
00054 #define QEI_RESET_VEL                   QEI_CON_RESV            
00055 #define QEI_RESET_IDX                   QEI_CON_RESI            
00057 /* QEI Direction Invert Type Option */
00058 #define QEI_DIRINV_NONE         ((uint32_t)(0))         
00059 #define QEI_DIRINV_CMPL         ((uint32_t)(1))         
00061 /* QEI Signal Mode Option */
00062 #define QEI_SIGNALMODE_QUAD             ((uint32_t)(0))         
00063 #define QEI_SIGNALMODE_CLKDIR   ((uint32_t)(1))         
00065 /* QEI Capture Mode Option */
00066 #define QEI_CAPMODE_2X                  ((uint32_t)(0))         
00067 #define QEI_CAPMODE_4X                  ((uint32_t)(1))         
00069 /* QEI Invert Index Signal Option */
00070 #define QEI_INVINX_NONE                 ((uint32_t)(0))         
00071 #define QEI_INVINX_EN                   ((uint32_t)(1))         
00073 /* QEI timer reload option */
00074 #define QEI_TIMERRELOAD_TICKVAL ((uint8_t)(0))  
00075 #define QEI_TIMERRELOAD_USVAL   ((uint8_t)(1))  
00077 /* QEI Flag Status type */
00078 #define QEI_STATUS_DIR                  ((uint32_t)(1<<0))      
00080 /* QEI Compare Position channel option */
00081 #define QEI_COMPPOS_CH_0                        ((uint8_t)(0))          
00082 #define QEI_COMPPOS_CH_1                        ((uint8_t)(1))          
00083 #define QEI_COMPPOS_CH_2                        ((uint8_t)(2))          
00085 /* QEI interrupt flag type */
00086 #define QEI_INTFLAG_INX_Int                     ((uint32_t)(1<<0))      
00087 #define QEI_INTFLAG_TIM_Int                     ((uint32_t)(1<<1))      
00088 #define QEI_INTFLAG_VELC_Int            ((uint32_t)(1<<2))      
00089 #define QEI_INTFLAG_DIR_Int                     ((uint32_t)(1<<3))      
00090 #define QEI_INTFLAG_ERR_Int                     ((uint32_t)(1<<4))      
00091 #define QEI_INTFLAG_ENCLK_Int           ((uint32_t)(1<<5))      
00092 #define QEI_INTFLAG_POS0_Int            ((uint32_t)(1<<6))      
00094 #define QEI_INTFLAG_POS1_Int            ((uint32_t)(1<<7))      
00096 #define QEI_INTFLAG_POS2_Int            ((uint32_t)(1<<8))      
00098 #define QEI_INTFLAG_REV_Int                     ((uint32_t)(1<<9))

00101 #define QEI_INTFLAG_POS1REV_Int         ((uint32_t)(1<<11))

00277 /* ---------------- CHECK PARAMETER DEFINITIONS ---------------------------- */
00278 /* Macro check QEI peripheral */
00279 #define PARAM_QEIx(n)   ((n==LPC_QEI))
00280 
00281 /* Macro check QEI reset type */
00282 #define PARAM_QEI_RESET(n)      ((n==QEI_CON_RESP) \
00283 || (n==QEI_RESET_POSOnIDX) \
00284 || (n==QEI_RESET_VEL) \
00285 || (n==QEI_RESET_IDX))
00286 
00287 /* Macro check QEI Direction invert mode */
00288 #define PARAM_QEI_DIRINV(n)     ((n==QEI_DIRINV_NONE) || (n==QEI_DIRINV_CMPL))
00289 
00290 /* Macro check QEI signal mode */
00291 #define PARAM_QEI_SIGNALMODE(n) ((n==QEI_SIGNALMODE_QUAD) || (n==QEI_SIGNALMODE_CLKDIR))
00292 
00293 /* Macro check QEI Capture mode */
00294 #define PARAM_QEI_CAPMODE(n)    ((n==QEI_CAPMODE_2X) || (n==QEI_CAPMODE_4X))
00295 
00296 /* Macro check QEI Invert index mode */
00297 #define PARAM_QEI_INVINX(n)             ((n==QEI_INVINX_NONE) || (n==QEI_INVINX_EN))
00298 
00299 /* Macro check QEI Direction invert mode */
00300 #define PARAM_QEI_TIMERRELOAD(n)        ((n==QEI_TIMERRELOAD_TICKVAL) || (n==QEI_TIMERRELOAD_USVAL))
00301 
00302 /* Macro check QEI status type */
00303 #define PARAM_QEI_STATUS(n)             ((n==QEI_STATUS_DIR))
00304 
00305 /* Macro check QEI combine position type */
00306 #define PARAM_QEI_COMPPOS_CH(n)         ((n==QEI_COMPPOS_CH_0) || (n==QEI_COMPPOS_CH_1) || (n==QEI_COMPPOS_CH_2))
00307 
00308 /* Macro check QEI interrupt flag type */
00309 #define PARAM_QEI_INTFLAG(n)    ((n==QEI_INTFLAG_INX_Int) \
00310 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_TIM_Int) \
00311 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_VELC_Int) \
00312 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_DIR_Int) \
00313 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_ERR_Int) \
00314 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_ENCLK_Int) \
00315 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_POS0_Int) \
00316 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_POS1_Int) \
00317 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_POS2_Int) \
00318 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_REV_Int) \
00319 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_POS0REV_Int) \
00320 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_POS1REV_Int) \
00321 || (n==QEI_INTFLAG_POS2REV_Int))
00322

00334 typedef struct {
00335         uint32_t DirectionInvert        :1;     
00339         uint32_t SignalMode                     :1;     
00343         uint32_t CaptureMode            :1;             
00347         uint32_t InvertIndex            :1;     
00351 } QEI_CFG_Type;

00357 
00358         uint8_t ReloadOption;           
00362         uint8_t Reserved[3];
00363         uint32_t ReloadValue;           
00366 } QEI_RELOADCFG_Type;
